Hero.title: Understanding a place through
Hero.description: Random Tailored Tours was born from a simple belief: the most meaningful way to understand a place is through its food, its people, and the stories that rarely make it into guidebooks.

Duality.random_desc: Represents the joy of discovery, the unexpected alley, the hidden table, the unplanned conversation. It's the magic that happens when you let go.
Duality.tailored_desc: Reflects our promise to shape each journey around you — your pace, your curiosity, your dietary needs, and your personal interests.

Methodology.title: Designed by Locals, Guided with Care.
Methodology.flexible_desc: Instead of following a fixed menu, we design flexible journeys that adapt to what you have already tried. Each tour follows a thoughtful progression: appetizers, mains, and dessert, balanced according to traditional Hanoian culinary standards.
Methodology.hospitality_desc: Hospitality should always feel safe, respectful, and human. That's why:

SisterBrand.tagline: "More than a tour — A Cultural Exchange."
SisterBrand.desc_1: Inspired by Vietnamese herbal traditions and mindful living. Lành.Naturals focuses on clean, thoughtfully crafted snacks and herbal teas made from local ingredients.
SisterBrand.desc_2: Designed to be gentle on the body and accessible to travelers with dietary sensitivities. This shared philosophy influences how we think about food, wellness, and care.
